statement.formal: [Obviously Not Real] Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable AI-powered systems. Specialized in RAG architectures, vector databases, and production ML systems. Passionate about bridging the gap between cutting-edge AI research and practical, user-focused applications.

detail.formal: Lead engineer for AI-powered products, building RAG systems and LLM integrations. Architected microservices handling 1M+ requests/day. Mentored team of 5 engineers.

AI & Systems: Built RAG system using LangChain, FAISS, and Claude API serving 10K+ daily users
Reduced API latency by 60% through intelligent caching and query optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Docker and GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 80%
Architected microservices architecture using FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and Redis

detail.formal: Full-stack development for SaaS platform. Built features from frontend to database, working across the entire stack.

Full Stack Development: Developed user authentication system handling 50K+ users with JWT and OAuth2
Built real-time dashboard using React and WebSockets for live data updates
Integrated payment processing with Stripe API, handling $2M+ annual transactions

detail.formal: Entry-level position working on web applications and internal tools. Gained experience with modern web technologies and agile development.

Web Development: Developed responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Built internal tools and dashboards for operations team
Participated in agile development process with daily standups and sprint planning

detail.formal: Specialised in Machine Learning and Distributed Systems. Completed dissertation on neural network optimisation techniques using gradient descent and backpropagation algorithms.
Graduated with First Class Honours. Focused on algorithms, data structures, and software engineering fundamentals.

projects.name: Career Toolkit
projects.description:
AI-powered career management toolkit for generating resumes, cover letters,
and optimizing content for different platforms.
